choices.text:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for seven days.  My restrictions are dairy, garlic, honey, almonds, pistachios, and cashews
Day 1: Breakfast - Oatmeal with fruit and nuts (without milk or honey)Lunch - Grilled chicken salad with mixed greens and avocadoDinner - Baked salmon with roasted vegetablesSnacks - Apple slices with almond butter
Day 2: Breakfast - Smoothie bowl with fruit, nuts, and seeds (without milk or honey)Lunch - Turkey lettuce wraps with veggiesDinner - Lentil soup with whole grain breadSnacks - Carrots and hummus
Day 3: Breakfast - Greek yogurt with mixed berries and granola (without honey)Lunch - Quinoa salad with grilled chicken and vegetablesDinner - Baked sweet potato topped with black beans and salsaSnacks - Rice crackers with guacamole
Day 4: Breakfast - Avocado toast with fruit and nuts (without milk or honey)Lunch - Grilled shrimp skewers with veggiesDinner - Baked salmon with roasted vegetablesSnacks - Apple slices with almond butter
Day 5: Breakfast - Smoothie bowl with fruit, nuts, and seeds (without milk or honey)Lunch - Turkey lettuce wraps with veggiesDinner - Lentil soup with whole grain breadSnacks - Carrots and hummus
Day 6: Breakfast - Greek yogurt with mixed berries and granola (without honey)Lunch - Quinoa salad with grilled chicken and vegetablesDinner - Baked sweet potato topped with black beans and salsaSnacks - Rice crackers with guacamole
Day 7: Breakfast - Avocado toast with fruit and nuts (without milk or honey)Lunch - Grilled shrimp skewers with veggiesDinner - Baked salmon with roasted vegetablesSnacks - Apple slices with almond butter
Note: You can also switch up the protein sources for variety, such as chicken, fish, tofu or legumes. Also, make sure you are drinking plenty of water throughout the day and getting enough fiber from fruits, veggies, and whole grains.
